title: Discontinue an Order
description: A patient has had an adverse reaction to a medication. The physician needs to discontinue the order immediately.

tasks.description: Open the patient's chart and view their active orders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Physician finds the list of current medication orders.

tasks.description: Select the medication order that needs to be stopped.
tasks.expected_outcome: Physician correctly identifies the medication causing the reaction.

tasks.description: Select the 'Discontinue' action, provide a reason ('Adverse reaction'), and sign the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is immediately inactivated on the MAR and in the pharmacy system.
